snippet.title: Katana Dragon - Official Reveal Trailer | Tsunoa Games
snippet.description:
Katana Dragon is an action-RPG adventure where you play as Shin & Nobi to:

🌍Explore a vast world
⚔️Fight against enemies & bosses
🏯Dungeons full of traps & puzzles
👘Equip, upgrade & customize your ninja

💚​katanadragon.com/kickstarter
✨​​katanadragon.com/steam
